info.description:
reference:  [url]  https://fr.m.wikipedia.org/wiki/Fichier:Labyrinthe_de_la_cath%C3%A9drale_de_Reims.svg  [/url]
[url] https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Labyrinth_of_the_Reims_Cathedral [/url]
It is also the official logo for French historical monuments.
info.name: Reims cathedral maze

renderpass.code:
// 533 chars in OpenGL. +38 chars on Windows angle to turnaround bugs

#define S(v)  step( .26, abs(fract(v+.5)-.5) )   // strips
//#define S(v)clamp( R.y*(abs(fract(v+.5)-.5)-.25) ,0.,1.)
#define o     V = abs(U),            /* octogonal coordinates */ \
              W = V.y > V.x ?  V.yx : V,                         \
              X = C(W) ? W : ( W + vec2(W.y,-W) )/1.41
#define C(W)     ( W.y/W.x < .41 )               // is horizontal or vertical octant
                                                 // Windows Angle bug. on OpenGL just C is ok
void mainImage( out vec4 O, vec2 u )
{
    vec2  R = iResolution.xy,
          U = 20.*( u+u - R ) / R.y, o, w=W;    // y and w to turnaround Windows Angle bugs
    float x = X.x, y=x;
    O *= 0.;
    O += y<2.5 ? 1.                              // === inner white  
       : y<14.25 && min(V.x,V.y)< 7.05           // === central shape
       ?                                         // --- maze hairpin turn
        V.x < V.y ? U.y>0.|| U.x>-.25 ? x++ : x  //     specific offsets
                  : U.x>0. ? x>10. ? x-- :x : x > 7. ? x-- : x, 
        C(W) &&                                     // horiz & vertic octants
          (   U.y < -V.x && X.y<1.75             // --- maze access
              && ( U.x>0. ? x<5.74               //     inside access
                          : x>12.25 && x<13.74 ) //     outside access
           || W.y<.74 && x > 3. && mod( x-1.27, V.x<-U.y ?2.:3. ) < 1.47  // hairpin turns 
          )  ? S(W.y)                            // insert coridor
             : S(x)                              // --- main octogonal strips 
       :
         -.01;      // on OpenGL you
   if(O.x<0.) O+=   // can delete these 2 lines
        !C(w)                                    // === corner shapes
          ? U = V-11.75, o, x = X.x,
            U++,                                 // offset for neck start
            U.x < -.4*U.y && U.y < -.4*U.x  
                   ? S((U.x-U.y)/1.41)           // neck
               : x>1.5 && x<5.5 
                   ? S(x)                        // corner octogonal strips
               :     1.                          // inner & outer white
          : 1.;                                  // === main horiz & vertic outer white
          
}
renderpass.name: Image
